trans-unit.source: Background: some systems have a Non-Uniform Memory Architecture, whereby main memory is split into banks which are “local” to specific CPU cores. Accessing local memory is faster than accessing remote memory. The OS provides APIs for allocating local memory and binding threads to particular CPU cores, so that we can ensure certain memory accesses are using local memory.
trans-unit.target: 背景：某些系统具有非统一内存体系结构，因此主内存被拆分为特定CPU核“本地”的存储体。访问本地内存比访问远程内存更快。该操作系统提供用于分配本地内存并将线程绑定到特定CPU内核的API，以便我们可以确保某些内存访问正在使用本地内存。

trans-unit.source: Because of the aggressive optimization that GHC performs to the programs it compiles it is quite difficult to pin-point exactly which point in the source program a given machine instruction should be attributed to. In fact, internally GHC associates each instruction with a set of source locations. When emitting the standard debug information used by gdb and other language-agnostic debugging tools, GHC is forced to heuristically choose one location from among this set.
trans-unit.target: 由于GHC对它进行编译的程序进行了积极的优化，因此很难准确地指出给定机器指令应归属于源程序中的哪一点。实际上，GHC在内部将每个指令与一组源位置相关联。当发出 gdb 和其他与语言无关的调试工具使用的标准调试信息时，GHC被迫从该组中试探性地选择一个位置。

trans-unit.target: 由于大多数UNIX链接器的状态令人沮丧，因此这些选项的顺序确实很重要。如果库⟨foo⟩需要库⟨bar⟩，则通常 -l ⟨bar⟩ 在命令行上应位于 -l ⟨foo⟩ 之前。

Because unboxed types are represented without the use of pointers, we cannot store them in use a polymorphic datatype at an unboxed type. For example, the Just node of Just 42# would have to be different from the Just node of Just 42; the former stores an integer directly, while the latter stores a pointer. GHC currently does not support this variety of Just nodes (nor for any other datatype). Accordingly, the kind of an unboxed type is different from the kind of a boxed type.
trans-unit.target: 因为未装箱的类型是在不使用指针的情况下表示的，所以我们不能以未装箱的类型使用多态数据类型来存储它们。例如， Just 的节点 Just 42# 将必须是从不同的 Just 的节点 Just 42 ; 前者直接存储整数，而后者存储指针。GHC当前不支持多种 Just 节点（也不支持任何其他数据类型）。因此，一种未装箱型的是从一种装箱类型的不同。

trans-unit.source: Before resorting to explicit unboxed types, try using strict constructor fields and -funbox-strict-fields first (see above). That way, your code stays portable.

trans-unit.source: Before using the Continuation monad, be sure that you have a firm understanding of continuation-passing style and that continuations represent the best solution to your particular design problem. Many algorithms which require continuations in other languages do not require them in Haskell, due to Haskell's lazy semantics. Abuse of the Continuation monad can produce code that is impossible to understand and maintain.
trans-unit.target: 在使用Continuation monad之前,请确保你对Continuation-passing风格有一个坚定的理解,并且Continuation代表了你特定设计问题的最佳解决方案。由于 Haskell 的懒惰语义,许多在其他语言中需要延续的算法在 Haskell 中并不需要。滥用Continuation单体会产生无法理解和维护的代码。

trans-unit.source: Before you get too carried away working at the lowest level (e.g., sloshing MutableByteArray#s around your program), you may wish to check if there are libraries that provide a “Haskellised veneer” over the features you want. trans-unit.source: Blackholing is the act of marking a thunk (lazy computation) as being under evaluation. It is useful for three reasons: firstly it lets us detect certain kinds of infinite loop (the NonTermination exception), secondly it avoids certain kinds of space leak, and thirdly it avoids repeating a computation in a parallel program, because we can tell when a computation is already in progress.
trans-unit.target: Blackholing是将一个thunk（惰性计算）标记为正在评估的行为。它之所以有用，有以下三个原因：首先，它使我们能够检测到某些类型的无限循环（ NonTermination 异常）；其次，它避免了某些类型的空间泄漏；其次，它避免了在并行程序中重复计算，因为我们可以知道何时计算已经在进行中。

trans-unit.source: Buffer allocation function. If Nothing is given, then a new first buffer should be allocated. trans-unit.source: Buggle only imports Prelude, which is compiled with Trustworthy. Prelude resides in the base package, which C trusts, and (we’ll assume) all of Prelude‘s imports are trusted. So C trusts Prelude, and so C also trusts Buggle. (While Prelude is typically imported implicitly, it still obeys the same rules outlined here).
trans-unit.target: Buggle仅导入使用 Trustworthy 编译的 Prelude 。 Prelude 驻留在 C 信任的 base 包中，并且（我们假设） Prelude 的所有导入都是受信任的。因此 C 信任 Prelude ，因此 C 也信任Buggle。（虽然 Prelude 通常是隐式导入的，但仍遵循此处概述的相同规则）。

trans-unit.source: Buggle only imports Prelude, which is compiled with Trustworthy. Prelude resides in the base package, which C trusts, and (we’ll assume) all of Prelude’s imports are trusted. trans-unit.source: Building Haskell code into a shared library is a good way to include Haskell code in a larger mixed-language project. While with static linking it is recommended to use GHC to perform the final link step, with shared libraries a Haskell library can be treated just like any other shared library. The linking can be done using the normal system C compiler or linker.
trans-unit.target: 将Haskell代码构建到共享库中是将Haskell代码包含在一个更大的混合语言项目中的好方法。虽然对于静态链接,建议使用GHC来执行最后的链接步骤,但对于共享库,Haskell库可以像其他共享库一样对待。链接可以使用普通的系统C编译器或链接器来完成。

trans-unit.source: Building a static library is done by using the ar tool, like so:
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用ar工具来构建静态库，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Building and using shared libraries is slightly more complicated than building and using static libraries. When using Cabal much of the detail is hidden, just use --enable-shared when configuring a package to build it into a shared library, or to link it against other packages built as shared libraries. The additional complexity when building code is to distinguish whether the code will be used in a shared library or will use shared library versions of other packages it depends on. There is additional complexity when installing and distributing shared libraries or programs that use shared libraries, to ensure that all shared libraries that are required at runtime are present in suitable locations.
trans-unit.target: 构建和使用共享库比构建和使用静态库稍微复杂一些。使用Cabal时，很多细节都是隐藏的，只需在配置软件包时将 --enable-shared 配置为将其构建到共享库中，或将其链接到作为共享库构建的其他软件包。构建代码时，额外的复杂性是区分代码是在共享库中使用还是在其依赖的其他软件包的共享库版本中使用。在安装和分发共享库或使用共享库的程序时，存在额外的复杂性，以确保运行时所需的所有共享库都位于适当的位置。

trans-unit.source: Building your own packages is also quite straightforward: we provide the Cabal infrastructure which automates the process of configuring, building, installing and distributing a package. All you need to do is write a simple configuration file, put a few files in the right places, and you have a package. See the Cabal documentation for details, and also the Cabal libraries (Distribution.Simple, for example).

Building your own packages is also quite straightforward: we provide the Cabal infrastructure which automates the process of configuring, building, installing and distributing a package. All you need to do is write a simple configuration file, put a few files in the right places, and you have a package. See the Cabal documentation for details, and also the Cabal libraries (Distribution.Simple, for example).
trans-unit.target: 构建自己的软件包也非常简单：我们提供Cabal基础结构，该基础结构可自动执行配置，构建，安装和分发软件包的过程。您需要做的就是编写一个简单的配置文件，在正确的位置放置几个文件，然后有了一个软件包。有关详细信息，请参见Cabal文档，以及Cabal库（例如Distribution.Simple）。

trans-unit.source: By default (when -hide-all-packages is not specified), GHC exposes only one version of a package, all other versions become hidden. If -package option is specified multiple times for the same package the last one overrides the previous ones. On the other hand, if -hide-all-packages is used, GHC allows you to expose multiple versions of a package by using the -package option multiple times with different versions of the same package.
trans-unit.target: 缺省情况下（未指定 -hide-all-packages 时），GHC仅公开一个版本的软件包，所有其他版本均被隐藏。如果为同一软件包多次指定 -package 选项，则最后一个将覆盖先前的软件包。另一方面，如果使用 -hide-all-packages ，则GHC允许您通过对同一软件包的不同版本多次使用 -package 选项来公开软件包的多个版本。

trans-unit.source: By default Ctl-C will generate a SIGINT signal, causing a UserInterrupt exception to be sent to the main Haskell thread of your program, which if not specially handled will terminate the program. Normally, this is exactly what is wanted: an orderly shutdown of the program in response to Ctl-C.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Ctl-C将生成 SIGINT 信号，从而将 UserInterrupt 异常发送到您程序的主Haskell线程，如果没有特别处理，它将终止程序。通常，这正是需要的：响应Ctl-C有序关闭程序。

trans-unit.source: By default GHC will be very quiet about what it is doing, only printing error messages. If you want to see in more detail what’s going on behind the scenes, add -v to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，GHC将对正在执行的操作保持安静，仅打印错误消息。如果您想更详细地了解幕后情况，请在命令行中添加 -v 。

trans-unit.source: By default only type class methods and methods marked INLINABLE or INLINE are specialised. This flag will specialise any overloaded function regardless of size if its unfolding is available. This flag is not included in any optimisation level as it can massively increase code size. It can be used in conjunction with -fexpose-all-unfoldings if you want to ensure all calls are specialised.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，仅专门处理类型类方法和标记为 INLINABLE 或 INLINE 的方法。如果可以展开，此标志将专用于任何重载函数，而不管其大小如何。此标志未包含在任何优化级别中，因为它会大大增加代码大小。如果要确保所有调用都专用，可以将它与 -fexpose-all-unfoldings 结合使用。

trans-unit.source: By default, ghc -M generates all the dependencies, and then concatenates them onto the end of makefile (or Makefile if makefile doesn’t exist) bracketed by the lines “# DO NOT DELETE: Beginning of Haskell dependencies” and “# DO NOT DELETE: End of Haskell dependencies”. If these lines already exist in the makefile, then the old dependencies are deleted first.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， ghc -M 生成所有依赖项，然后将它们连接到 makefile 的末尾（如果 makefile 不存在，则将其合并到 Makefile 的末尾），并用“ # DO NOT DELETE: Beginning of Haskell dependencies ”和“ # DO NOT DELETE: End of Haskell dependencies ”。如果 makefile 中已经存在这些行，则首先删除旧的依赖项。

trans-unit.source: By default, GHC (as the Haskell 2010 standard prescribes) parses identifiers starting with an underscore in a type as type variables. To treat them as named wildcards, the NamedWildCards extension should be enabled. The example below demonstrated the effect.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，GHC（按Haskell 2010标准的规定）将以下划线开头的标识符解析为类型变量。要将它们视为命名通配符，应启用 NamedWildCards 扩展。下面的示例演示了效果。

trans-unit.source: By default, GHC mainly aims to behave (mostly) like a Haskell 2010 compiler, although you can tell it to try to behave like a particular version of the language with the Haskell98 and Haskell2010 flags. The known deviations from the standards are described below. Unless otherwise stated, the deviation applies in Haskell 98, Haskell 2010 and the default modes.

By default, GHC mainly aims to behave (mostly) like a Haskell 2010 compiler, although you can tell it to try to behave like a particular version of the language with the -XHaskell98 and -XHaskell2010 flags. The known deviations from the standards are described below. Unless otherwise stated, the deviation applies in Haskell 98, Haskell 2010 and the default modes.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，GHC的主要目的是（基本上）像Haskell 2010编译器那样运行，尽管您可以使用 -XHaskell98 和 -XHaskell2010 标志让它尝试像特定版本的语言一样运行。与标准的已知偏差如下所述。除非另有说明，否则该偏差适用于Haskell 98，Haskell 2010和默认模式。

trans-unit.source: By default, GHC will automatically link in the base and rts packages. This flag disables that behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，GHC将自动链接 base 和 rts 软件包。此标志禁用该行为。

trans-unit.source: By default, GHCi compiles Haskell source code into byte-code that is interpreted by the runtime system. GHCi can also compile Haskell code to object code: to turn on this feature, use the -fobject-code flag either on the command line or with :set (the option -fbyte-code restores byte-code compilation again). Compiling to object code takes longer, but typically the code will execute 10-20 times faster than byte-code.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，GHCi将Haskell源代码编译为运行时系统解释的字节码。GHCi也可以将Haskell代码编译为目标代码：要启用此功能，请在命令行上或通过 :set 使用 -fobject-code 标志（选项 -fbyte-code 可再次恢复字节码编译）。编译为目标代码需要更长的时间，但是通常，该代码的执行速度比字节码快10到20倍。

trans-unit.source: By default, all exposed packages in the normal, source import namespace are also available for plugins. This causes those packages to be hidden by default. If you use this flag, then any packages with plugins you require need to be explicitly exposed using -plugin-package ⟨pkg⟩ options.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，正常的源导入名称空间中的所有公开包也可用于插件。这将导致这些包在默认情况下被隐藏。如果使用此标志，则需要使用 -plugin-package ⟨pkg⟩ 选项显式公开所需的所有带有插件的软件包。

trans-unit.source: By default, all of the capabilities participate in parallel garbage collection. If we want to use a very large -N value, however, this can reduce the performance of the GC. For this reason, the -qn flag can be used to specify a lower number for the threads that should participate in GC. During GC, if there are more than this number of workers active, some of them will sleep for the duration of the GC.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，所有功能都参与并行垃圾回收。但是，如果我们要使用非常大的 -N 值，则会降低GC的性能。因此，可以使用 -qn 标志为应该参与GC的线程指定一个较小的数字。在GC期间，如果活动的工人数量超过此数目，则其中一些工人将在GC期间休眠。

trans-unit.source: By default, each hole fit shows the provenance information of its hole fit, i.e. where it was bound or defined, and what module it was originally defined in if it was imported. This can be toggled off using the reverse of this flag.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,每个孔配合都会显示其孔配合的出处信息,即它是在哪里绑定或定义的,如果是导入的,它最初是在哪个模块中定义的。这可以使用这个标志的反面来切换关闭。

trans-unit.source: By default, if idle GC is enabled in the threaded runtime, a major GC will be performed every time the process goes idle for a sufficiently long duration (see -I ⟨seconds⟩). For large server processes accepting regular but infrequent requests (e.g., once per second), an expensive, major GC may run after every request. As an alternative to shutting off idle GC entirely (with -I0), a minimum wait time between idle GCs can be specified with this flag. For example, -Iw60 will ensure that an idle GC runs at most once per minute.

By default, modules compiled with plugins are always recompiled even if the source file is unchanged. This most conservative option is taken due to the ability of plugins to perform arbitrary IO actions. In order to control the recompilation behaviour you can modify the pluginRecompile field in Plugin.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，即使源文件未更改，也始终会重新编译使用插件编译的模块。由于插件具有执行任意IO操作的能力，因此采用了这种最保守的选项。为了控制重新编译行为，您可以修改 Plugin 中的 pluginRecompile 字段。

trans-unit.source: By default, the flag will cause a warning to be emitted to stderr when the sync time exceeds the specified time. This behaviour can be overridden, however: the longGCSync() hook is called when the sync time is exceeded during the sync period, and the longGCSyncEnd() hook at the end. Both of these hooks can be overridden in the RtsConfig when the runtime is started with hs_init_ghc(). The default implementations of these hooks (LongGcSync() and LongGCSyncEnd() respectively) print warnings to stderr.

By default, the flag will cause a warning to be emitted to stderr when the sync time exceeds the specified time. This behaviour can be overriden, however: the longGCSync() hook is called when the sync time is exceeded during the sync period, and the longGCSyncEnd() hook at the end. Both of these hooks can be overriden in the RtsConfig when the runtime is started with hs_init_ghc(). The default implementations of these hooks (LongGcSync() and LongGCSyncEnd() respectively) print warnings to stderr.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，当同步时间超过指定时间时，该标志将导致向stderr发出警告。此行为可以被覆盖，但是：在 longGCSync() 在同步期间超过同步时间时钩被调用，并且 longGCSyncEnd() 在端钩。使用 hs_init_ghc() 启动运行 RtsConfig ，可以在RtsConfig中覆盖这两个钩子。这些钩子的默认实现 LongGCSyncEnd() 分别为 LongGcSync() 和LongGCSyncEnd（））向stderr打印警告。

trans-unit.source: By default, the hole fits show the type application needed to make this hole fit fit the type of the hole, e.g. for the hole (_ :: Int -> [Int]), mempty :: Monoid a => a is a hole fit with mempty @(Int -> [Int]). This flag toggles whether to show a ~ (Int -> [Int]) instead of mempty @(Int -> [Int]) in the where clause of the valid hole fit message.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，孔配合显示使该孔适合孔的类型所需的类型应用程序，例如，对于孔 (_ :: Int -> [Int]) mempty :: Monoid a => a > [Int]），mempty :: Monoid a => a是一个孔适合 mempty @(Int -> [Int]) 。此标志切换是否在有效的孔拟合消息的where子句中显示 a ~ (Int -> [Int]) mempty @(Int -> [Int]) > [Int]）而不是mempty @（Int-> [Int]）。

trans-unit.source: By default, the hole fits show the type application needed to make this hole fit fit the type of the hole, e.g. for the hole (_ :: Int -> [Int]), mempty is a hole fit with mempty @(Int -> [Int]). This can be toggled off with the reverse of this flag.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，孔配合显示使该孔适合孔的类型所需的类型应用程序，例如，对于孔 (_ :: Int -> [Int]) mempty > [Int]），mempty是带有 mempty @(Int -> [Int]) 。可以通过此标志的相反方向将其关闭。

trans-unit.source: By default, the type-checker will report an error message for each hole in a partial type signature, informing the programmer of the inferred type. When the PartialTypeSignatures extension is enabled, the type-checker will accept the inferred type for each hole, generating warnings instead of errors. Additionally, these warnings can be silenced with the -Wno-partial-type-signatures flag.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，类型检查器将报告部分类型签名中每个孔的错误消息，以将推断出的类型通知程序员。当 PartialTypeSignatures 启用扩展，类型检查器将接受该推断出的类型对于每个孔，生成警告，而不是错误。此外，可以使用 -Wno-partial-type-signatures 标志使这些警告静音。

This means that if the two modules have the same fingerprint then the plugin will always return the same result. Declaring a plugin as pure means that the plugin will never cause a module to be recompiled.

By overriding the renamedResultAction field we can modify each HsGroup after it has been renamed. A source file is separated into groups depending on the location of template haskell splices so the contents of these groups may not be intuitive. In order to save the entire renamed AST for inspection at the end of typechecking you can set renamedResultAction to keepRenamedSource which is provided by the Plugins module. This is important because some parts of the renamed syntax tree (for example, imports) are not found in the typechecked one.
trans-unit.target: 通过覆盖重 renamedResultAction 字段，我们可以在每个 HsGroup 重命名后对其进行修改。根据模板haskell接头的位置，源文件分为几组，因此这些组的内容可能不直观。为了节省检查整个重命名AST的类型检查，您可以设置结束 renamedResultAction 到 keepRenamedSource 这是由提供 Plugins 模块。这很重要，因为在类型检查的树中找不到重命名的语法树的某些部分（例如，导入）。

trans-unit.source: CSV is a character-based representation of tables. For maximal modularity, we could first render Tables as Strings and then encode this String using some Unicode character encoding. However, this sacrifices performance due to the intermediate String representation being built and thrown away right afterwards. We get rid of this intermediate String representation by fixing the character encoding to UTF-8 and using Builders to convert Tables directly to UTF-8 encoded CSV tables represented as lazy ByteStrings.
trans-unit.target: CSV是表的基于字符的表示形式。为了获得最大的模块化，我们可以首先将 Table 呈现为 String ，然后使用某种Unicode字符编码对该 String 进行编码。但是，由于中间的 String 表示被构建并随后被丢弃，这牺牲了性能。我们通过将字符编码固定为UTF-8并使用 Builder 来将 Table 直接转换为UTF-8编码的懒惰 ByteString 表示的CSV表，从而摆脱了中间的 String 表示形式。

trans-unit.source: CSV is a character-based representation of tables. For maximal modularity, we could first render Tables as Strings and then encode this String using some Unicode character encoding. However, this sacrifices performance due to the intermediate String representation being built and thrown away right afterwards. We get rid of this intermediate String representation by fixing the character encoding to UTF-8 and using Builders to convert Tables directly to UTF-8 encoded CSV tables represented as lazy ByteStrings.

trans-unit.source: Calling hs_thread_done() is entirely optional. You can call it as often or as little as you like. It is safe to call it from a thread that has never called any Haskell functions, or one that never will. If you forget to call it, the worst that can happen is that some memory remains allocated until hs_exit() is called. If you call it too often, the worst that can happen is that the next call to a Haskell function incurs some extra overhead.
trans-unit.target: 调用 hs_thread_done() 完全是可选的。您可以根据需要随意或不多地调用它。从从未调用过任何Haskell函数或从未调用过任何Haskell函数的线程中调用它是安全的。如果您忘记调用它，则可能发生的最坏情况是在调用 hs_exit() 之前，仍会分配一些内存。如果您经常调用它，则可能发生的最坏情况是下一次调用Haskell函数会产生一些额外的开销。

trans-unit.source: Calling a foreign export has a lot of overhead: it creates a complete new Haskell thread, for example.
trans-unit.target: 调用国外的导出有很多开销:例如,它会创建一个完整的新的Haskell线程。

trans-unit.source: Cause GHC to spew a long usage message to standard output and then exit.

trans-unit.source: Causes ghc-pkg to ignore missing dependencies, directories and libraries when registering a package, and just go ahead and add it anyway. This might be useful if your package installation system needs to add the package to GHC before building and installing the files.
trans-unit.target: 使 ghc-pkg 在注册程序包时忽略缺少的依赖项，目录和库，并继续进行添加。如果您的软件包安装系统需要在构建和安装文件之前将软件包添加到GHC，这可能会很有用。

trans-unit.source: Causes ghc-pkg to interpret arguments as installed package IDs (e.g., an identifier like unix-2.3.1.0-de7803f1a8cd88d2161b29b083c94240). This is useful if providing just the package name and version are ambiguous (in old versions of GHC, this was guaranteed to be unique, but this invariant no longer necessarily holds).
trans-unit.target: 使 ghc-pkg 将参数解释为已安装的程序包ID（例如，诸如 unix-2.3.1.0-de7803f1a8cd88d2161b29b083c94240 之类的标识符）。如果仅提供软件包名称和版本不明确，这将很有用（在GHC的旧版本中，这被保证是唯一的，但是这种不变性不再成立）。

trans-unit.source: Causes ghc-pkg to interpret arguments as unit IDs (e.g., an identifier like I5BErHzyOm07EBNpKBEeUv). Package keys are used to prefix symbol names GHC produces (e.g., 6VWy06pWzzJq9evDvK2d4w6_DataziByteStringziInternal_unsafePackLenChars_info), so if you need to figure out what package a symbol belongs to, use ghc-pkg with this flag.
trans-unit.target: 使 ghc-pkg 将参数解释为单位ID（例如，类似 I5BErHzyOm07EBNpKBEeUv 的标识符）。包密钥用于为GHC产生的符号名称添加前缀（例如 6VWy06pWzzJq9evDvK2d4w6_DataziByteStringziInternal_unsafePackLenChars_info ），因此，如果需要确定符号属于哪个包，请使用带有该标志的 ghc-pkg 。

trans-unit.source: Causes GHC to continue the compilation if a module has an error. Any reverse dependencies are pruned immediately and the whole compilation is still flagged as an error. This option has no effect if parallel compilation (-j[⟨n⟩]) is in use.

Causes GHC to display error messages with colors. To do this, the terminal must have support for ANSI color codes, or else garbled text will appear. The default value is auto, which means GHC will make an attempt to detect whether terminal supports colors and choose accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 使GHC显示带有颜色的错误消息。为此，终端必须支持ANSI颜色代码，否则会出现乱码。默认值为 auto ，这意味着GHC将尝试检测终端是否支持颜色并进行相应选择。

trans-unit.source: Causes GHC to emit the full source span of the syntactic entity relating to an error message. Normally, GHC emits the source location of the start of the syntactic entity only.
trans-unit.target: 使GHC发出与错误消息有关的句法实体的全部源跨度,通常情况下,GHC只发出句法实体起始的源位置。通常情况下,GHC只发出句法实体开始的源位置。

trans-unit.source: Causes GHC to group diagnostic messages by severity and output them after other messages when building a multi-module Haskell program. This flag can make diagnostic messages more visible when used in conjunction with --make and -j[⟨n⟩]. Otherwise, it can be hard to find the relevant errors or likely to ignore the warnings when they are mixed with many other messages.
Causes GHC to ignore uses of the function Exception.assert in source code (in other words, rewriting Exception.assert p e to e (see Assertions).
trans-unit.target: 使GHC忽略源代码中对 Exception.assert 函数的使用（换句话说，将 Exception.assert p e 重写为 e （请参见Assertions）。

trans-unit.source: Causes GHC to output errors in reverse line-number order, so that the errors and warnings that originate later in the file are displayed first.
trans-unit.target: 使GHC以相反的行号顺序输出错误,使文件中后面出现的错误和警告先显示。

trans-unit.source: Causes GHCi to halt evaluation and return to the interactive prompt in the event of an exception. -fbreak-on-error breaks on only those exceptions which would otherwise be uncaught.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生异常，使GHCi停止评估并返回交互式提示。 -fbreak-on-error 仅中断那些否则将无法捕获的异常。

trans-unit.source: Causes GHCi to halt evaluation and return to the interactive prompt in the event of an exception. -fbreak-on-exception breaks on all exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生异常，使GHCi停止评估并返回交互式提示。 -fbreak-on-exception 会在所有异常上中断。

trans-unit.source: Causes a specific warning to be treated as normal warning, not fatal error.
trans-unit.target: 导致特定警告被视为正常警告,而不是致命错误。

trans-unit.source: Causes a the finalizer associated with a weak pointer to be run immediately.
trans-unit.target: 使与弱指针相关的定标器立即运行。

trans-unit.source: Causes a warning to be emitted for foreign declarations that use unsupported calling conventions. In particular, if the stdcall calling convention is used on an architecture other than i386 then it will be treated as ccall.
trans-unit.target: 使使用不支持的调用约定的外部声明发出警告。特别是，如果在非i386的体系结构上使用 stdcall 调用约定，则它将被视为 ccall 。

trans-unit.source: Causes a warning to be emitted if an enumeration is empty, e.g. [5 .. 3].
trans-unit.target: 如果枚举为空（例如 [5 .. 3] ，则发出警告。

trans-unit.source: Causes a warning to be emitted when a datatype T is exported with all constructors, i.e. T(..), but is it just a type synonym.

trans-unit.source: Causes a warning to be emitted when a module, function or type with a WARNING or DEPRECATED pragma is used. See WARNING and DEPRECATED pragmas for more details on the pragmas.

trans-unit.source: Causes a warning to be emitted when a module, function or type with a WARNING or DEPRECATED pragma is used. See WARNING and DEPRECATED pragmas for more details on the pragmas. An alias for -Wwarnings-deprecations.
trans-unit.target: 当使用带有 WARNING 或不建议 DEPRECATED pragma 的模块，功能或类型时，导致发出警告。有关实用程序的更多详细信息，请参见警告和不建议使用的实用程序。 -Wwarnings-deprecations 的别名。

trans-unit.source: Causes a warning to be emitted when a pragma that GHC doesn’t recognise is used. As well as pragmas that GHC itself uses, GHC also recognises pragmas known to be used by other tools, e.g. OPTIONS_HUGS and DERIVE.
trans-unit.target: 当使用GHC无法识别的编译指示时，发出警告。除了GHC本身使用的编译指示外，GHC还识别已知由其他工具（例如 OPTIONS_HUGS 和 DERIVE )使用的编译指示。

trans-unit.target: 将类型错误推迟到运行时，导致报告警告。请参见将类型错误推迟到运行时

Causes all files following this option on the command line to be processed as if they had the suffix ⟨suffix⟩. For example, to compile a Haskell module in the file M.my-hs, use ghc -c -x hs M.my-hs.
trans-unit.target: 使命令行上此选项之后的所有文件都被视为带有后缀“ suffix”。例如，要在文件 M.my-hs 中编译Haskell模块，请使用 ghc -c -x hs M.my-hs 。

trans-unit.source: Causes the compiler to behave as if package ⟨pkg⟩, and any packages that depend on ⟨pkg⟩, are not installed at all.
trans-unit.target: 导致编译器的行为就像包⟨pkg⟩,以及任何依赖⟨pkg⟩的包,根本没有安装一样。

trans-unit.source: Causes the compiler to emit a warning when a Prelude numeric conversion converts a type T to the same type T; such calls are probably no-ops and can be omitted. The functions checked for are: toInteger, toRational, fromIntegral, and realToFrac.
trans-unit.target: 当Prelude数字转换将类型 T 转换为相同的类型 T 时，使编译器发出警告；这样的调用可能是无操作的，因此可以省略。检查的函数为： toInteger ， toRational ， fromIntegral 和 realToFrac 。

trans-unit.source: Causes the compiler to emit a warning when a module or interface file in the current directory is shadowing one with the same module name in a library or other directory.
trans-unit.target: 当当前目录下的模块或接口文件在库或其他目录下与相同模块名的文件产生影子时,导致编译器发出警告。

trans-unit.source: Causes the finalizers associated with a foreign pointer to be run immediately.
trans-unit.target: 导致与外来指针相关联的定标器被立即运行。

trans-unit.source: Causes the output from all of the flags listed below to be dumped to a file. The file name depends upon the output produced; for instance, output from -ddump-simpl will end up in module.dump-simpl.
trans-unit.target: 使以下列出的所有标志的输出转储到文件中。文件名取决于产生的输出。例如， -ddump-simpl 的输出将最终在 module.dump-simpl 。

trans-unit.source: Caution: index necessarily delays retrieving the requested element until the result is forced. It can therefore lead to a space leak if the result is stored, unforced, in another structure. To retrieve an element immediately without forcing it, use lookup or (!?).
trans-unit.target: 注意： index 必须延迟检索请求的元素，直到强制执行结果为止。因此，如果结果未经强制存储在另一个结构中，则可能导致空间泄漏。要立即检索一个元素而不强制它，请使用 lookup 或 (!?) 。

trans-unit.source: Caveat for POSIX systems: This function returns a timestamp with sub-second resolution only if this package is compiled against unix-2.6.0.0 or later and the underlying filesystem supports them.
trans-unit.target: 针对POSIX系统的警告：仅当此程序包针对 unix-2.6.0.0 或更高版本进行编译且基础文件系统支持它们时，此函数才返回具有亚秒级分辨率的时间戳。

trans-unit.source: Classes are subject to the same rules:

Classes have their roles default to nominal to promote coherence of class instances. If a C Int were stored in a datatype, it would be quite bad if that were somehow changed into a C Age somewhere, especially if another C Age had been declared!
trans-unit.target: 类的角色默认为名义角色，以促进类实例的一致性。如果将 C Int 存储在数据类型中，如果以某种方式将C Int更改为 C Age ，那将是非常糟糕的，特别是如果已经声明了另一个 C Age ！

trans-unit.source: Close all file descriptors except stdin, stdout and stderr in the new process (on Windows, only works if std_in, std_out, and std_err are all Inherit). This implementation will call close an every fd from 3 to the maximum of open files, which can be slow for high maximum of open files.
trans-unit.target: 关闭新进程中除stdin、stdout和stderr以外的所有文件描述符(在Windows上,只有当std_in、std_out和std_err都是Inherit时才有效)。这个实现会在3到最大打开文件数的范围内,每隔一个fd就会调用关闭一个文件,这对于最大打开文件数较多的情况下会比较慢。

trans-unit.source: Close the stream's file descriptor without passing a Handle. On POSIX systems this may lead to strange behavior in the child process because attempting to read or write after the file has been closed throws an error. This should only be used with child processes that don't use the file descriptor at all. If you wish to ignore the child process's output you should either create a pipe and drain it manually or pass a Handle that writes to /dev/null.
trans-unit.target: 在不传递句柄的情况下关闭流的文件描述符。在POSIX系统上，这可能导致子进程中的异常行为，因为在关闭文件后尝试读取或写入会引发错误。这仅应用于完全不使用文件描述符的子进程。如果您希望忽略子进程的输出，则应该创建一个管道并手动将其 Handle ，或者传递一个写入 /dev/null 的Handle。

trans-unit.source: Code coverage tools allow a programmer to determine what parts of their code have been actually executed, and which parts have never actually been invoked. GHC has an option for generating instrumented code that records code coverage as part of the Haskell Program Coverage (HPC) toolkit, which is included with GHC. HPC tools can be used to render the generated code coverage information into human understandable format.
trans-unit.target: 代码覆盖工具允许程序员确定他们的代码中哪些部分已经被实际执行,哪些部分从未被实际调用。GHC有一个选项用于生成记录代码覆盖率的工具代码,作为GHC中包含的Haskell程序覆盖率(HPC)工具包的一部分。HPC工具可以用来将生成的代码覆盖率信息渲染成人类可以理解的格式。

trans-unit.source: Command line
trans-unit.target: 命令行

trans-unit.source: Command-line arguments are either options or file names.
trans-unit.target: 命令行参数是选项或文件名。

trans-unit.source: Command-line options begin with -. They may not be grouped: -vO is different from -v -O. Options need not precede filenames: e.g., ghc *.o -o foo. All options are processed and then applied to all files; you cannot, for example, invoke ghc -c -O1 Foo.hs -O2 Bar.hs to apply different optimisation levels to the files Foo.hs and Bar.hs.
trans-unit.target: 命令行选项以 - 开头。它们可能未分组： -vO 与 -v -O 不同。选项不必在文件名之前：例如 ghc *.o -o foo 。处理所有选项，然后将其应用于所有文件；你不能，例如，调用 ghc -c -O1 Foo.hs -O2 Bar.hs 不同的优化级别适用于文件 Foo.hs 和 Bar.hs 。

trans-unit.source: Commands produce values, but (like monadic computations) may yield more than one value, or none, and may do other things as well. For the most part, familiarity with monadic notation is a good guide to using commands. However the values of expressions, even monadic ones, are determined by the values of the variables they contain; this is not necessarily the case for commands.
trans-unit.target: 命令产生值,但(像单项计算一样)可能产生多个值,或者没有,也可能做其他事情。在大多数情况下,熟悉单项符号是使用命令的良好指南。然而表达式的值,即使是一元的表达式,也是由它们所包含的变量的值决定的;而命令则不一定是这样。

trans-unit.source: Commands that query the package database (list, latest, describe, field, dot) operate on the list of databases specified by the flags --user, --global, and --package-db. If none of these flags are given, the default is --global --user.
trans-unit.target: 查询软件包数据库的命令（列表，最新，描述，字段，点）在由 --user ，-- --global 和 --package-db 标志指定的数据库列表上运行。如果没有给出这些标志，则默认值为 --global --user 。

trans-unit.source: Computation getFullArgs is the "raw" version of getArgs, similar to argv in other languages. It returns a list of the program's command line arguments, starting with the program name, and including those normally eaten by the RTS (+RTS ... -RTS).
trans-unit.target: 计算 getFullArgs 是“原始”版本 getArgs ，类似于 argv 的其他语言。它返回程序命令行参数的列表，从程序名称开始，包括RTS通常吃掉的参数（+ RTS ... -RTS）。

trans-unit.source: Computation hClosehdl makes handle hdl closed. Before the computation finishes, if hdl is writable its buffer is flushed as for hFlush. Performing hClose on a handle that has already been closed has no effect; doing so is not an error. All other operations on a closed handle will fail. If hClose fails for any reason, any further operations (apart from hClose) on the handle will still fail as if hdl had been successfully closed.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hClose hdl 使句柄 hdl 关闭。在计算完成之前，如果 hdl 是可写的，则其缓冲区与 hFlush 一样被刷新。在已经关闭的句柄上执行 hClose 无效；这样做不是错误。在闭合句柄上的所有其他操作将失败。如果 hClose 由于任何原因失败，则该句柄上的任何其他操作（除 hClose 之外）仍将失败，就像 hdl 已成功关闭一样。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetBufferinghdl returns the current buffering mode for hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetBuffering hdl 返回当前缓冲模式 hdl 。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetCharhdl reads a character from the file or channel managed by hdl, blocking until a character is available.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetChar hdl 从 hdl 管理的文件或通道中读取字符，并阻塞直到有字符可用为止。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetContentshdl returns the list of characters corresponding to the unread portion of the channel or file managed by hdl, which is put into an intermediate state, semi-closed. In this state, hdl is effectively closed, but items are read from hdl on demand and accumulated in a special list returned by hGetContentshdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetContents hdl 返回与由 hdl 管理的通道或文件的未读部分相对应的字符列表，该字符处于半封闭状态，处于中间状态。在这种状态下， hdl 实际上是关闭的，但是根据需要从 hdl 中读取项目，并将其累积在 hGetContents hdl 返回的特殊列表中。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetLinehdl reads a line from the file or channel managed by hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetLine hdl 从 hdl 管理的文件或通道中读取一行。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetPosnhdl returns the current I/O position of hdl as a value of the abstract type HandlePosn.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetPosn hdl 返回的当前I / O位置 hdl 为抽象类型的值 HandlePosn 。

trans-unit.source: Computation hLookAhead returns the next character from the handle without removing it from the input buffer, blocking until a character is available.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hLookAhead 从句柄中返回下一个字符，而不将其从输入缓冲区中删除，直到一个字符可用为止，它一直阻塞。

trans-unit.source: Computation hPutCharhdl ch writes the character ch to the file or channel managed by hdl. Characters may be buffered if buffering is enabled for hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hPutChar hdl ch 写入字符 ch 被管理的文件或通道 hdl 。如果为 hdl 启用了缓冲，则可以缓冲字符。

trans-unit.source: Computation hPutStrhdl s writes the string s to the file or channel managed by hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hPutStr hdl s 写入字符串 s 被管理的文件或通道 hdl 。

trans-unit.source: Computation hSeekhdl mode i sets the position of handle hdl depending on mode. The offset i is given in terms of 8-bit bytes.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hSeek hdl mode i 根据 mode 设置手柄 hdl 的位置。偏移量 i 以8位字节的形式给出。

trans-unit.source: Computation hSetBufferinghdl mode sets the mode of buffering for handle hdl on subsequent reads and writes.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hSetBuffering hdl mode 设置在后续读写中为句柄 hdl 缓冲的模式。

trans-unit.source: Computation hTellhdl returns the current position of the handle hdl, as the number of bytes from the beginning of the file. The value returned may be subsequently passed to hSeek to reposition the handle to the current position.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hTell hdl 返回句柄 hdl 的当前位置，作为从文件开头开始的字节数。返回的值可以随后传递给 hSeek 以将手柄重新定位到当前位置。

trans-unit.source: Computation hWaitForInputhdl t waits until input is available on handle hdl. It returns True as soon as input is available on hdl, or False if no input is available within t milliseconds. Note that hWaitForInput waits until one or more full characters are available, which means that it needs to do decoding, and hence may fail with a decoding error.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hWaitForInput hdl t 等待直到输入在句柄 hdl 上可用。它返回 True ，只要输入可用的 hdl ，或 False ，如果没有输入中提供 t 毫秒。请注意， hWaitForInput 等待一个或多个完整字符可用，这意味着它需要进行解码，因此可能会因解码错误而失败。

trans-unit.source: Computation openFilefile mode allocates and returns a new, open handle to manage the file file. It manages input if mode is ReadMode, output if mode is WriteMode or AppendMode, and both input and output if mode is ReadWriteMode.
trans-unit.target: 计算 openFile file mode 分配并返回一个新的打开的句柄来管理文件 file 。它管理如果输入 mode 是 ReadMode ，如果输出 mode 是 WriteMode 或 AppendMode ，和输入和输出，如果模式是 ReadWriteMode 。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetCharhdl reads a character from the file or channel managed by hdl, blocking until a character is available.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetChar hdl 从 hdl 管理的文件或通道中读取字符，并阻塞直到有字符可用为止。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetContentshdl returns the list of characters corresponding to the unread portion of the channel or file managed by hdl, which is put into an intermediate state, semi-closed. In this state, hdl is effectively closed, but items are read from hdl on demand and accumulated in a special list returned by hGetContentshdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetContents hdl 返回与由 hdl 管理的通道或文件的未读部分相对应的字符列表，该字符处于半封闭状态，处于中间状态。在这种状态下， hdl 实际上是关闭的，但是根据需要从 hdl 中读取项目，并将其累积在 hGetContents hdl 返回的特殊列表中。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetLinehdl reads a line from the file or channel managed by hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetLine hdl 从 hdl 管理的文件或通道中读取一行。

trans-unit.source: Computation hPutCharhdl ch writes the character ch to the file or channel managed by hdl. Characters may be buffered if buffering is enabled for hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hPutChar hdl ch 写入字符 ch 被管理的文件或通道 hdl 。如果为 hdl 启用了缓冲，则可以缓冲字符。

trans-unit.source: Computation hPutStrhdl s writes the string s to the file or channel managed by hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hPutStr hdl s 写入字符串 s 被管理的文件或通道 hdl 。

trans-unit.source: Computation hWaitForInputhdl t waits until input is available on handle hdl. It returns True as soon as input is available on hdl, or False if no input is available within t milliseconds. Note that hWaitForInput waits until one or more full characters are available, which means that it needs to do decoding, and hence may fail with a decoding error.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hWaitForInput hdl t 等待直到输入在句柄 hdl 上可用。它返回 True ，只要输入可用的 hdl ，或 False ，如果没有输入中提供 t 毫秒。请注意， hWaitForInput 等待一个或多个完整字符可用，这意味着它需要进行解码，因此可能会因解码错误而失败。

trans-unit.source: Computation getCPUTime returns the number of picoseconds CPU time used by the current program. The precision of this result is implementation-dependent.
trans-unit.target: 计算 getCPUTime 返回当前程序使用的皮秒CPU时间。此结果的精度取决于实现方式。

trans-unit.source: Computation getArgs returns a list of the program's command line arguments (not including the program name).
trans-unit.target: Computation getArgs 返回程序的命令行参数列表（不包括程序名称）。

trans-unit.source: Computation getEnvvar returns the value of the environment variable var. For the inverse, the setEnv function can be used.
trans-unit.target: 计算 getEnv var 返回环境变量 var 的值。反之，可以使用 setEnv 函数。

trans-unit.source: Computation getEnvvar returns the value of the environment variable var. For the inverse, the setEnv function can be used.

Computation hClosehdl makes handle hdl closed. Before the computation finishes, if hdl is writable its buffer is flushed as for hFlush. Performing hClose on a handle that has already been closed has no effect; doing so is not an error. All other operations on a closed handle will fail. If hClose fails for any reason, any further operations (apart from hClose) on the handle will still fail as if hdl had been successfully closed.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hClose hdl 使句柄 hdl 关闭。在计算完成之前，如果 hdl 是可写的，则其缓冲区与 hFlush 一样被刷新。在已经关闭的句柄上执行 hClose 无效；这样做不是错误。在闭合句柄上的所有其他操作将失败。如果 hClose 由于任何原因失败，则该句柄上的任何其他操作（除 hClose 之外）仍将失败，就像 hdl 已成功关闭一样。

trans-unit.source: Computation hPutStrhdl s writes the string s to the file or channel managed by hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hPutStr hdl s 写入字符串 s 被管理的文件或通道 hdl 。

trans-unit.source: Computation getArgs returns a list of the program's command line arguments (not including the program name).
trans-unit.target: Computation getArgs 返回程序的命令行参数列表（不包括程序名称）。

trans-unit.source: Computation getEnvvar returns the value of the environment variable var. For the inverse, the setEnv function can be used.
trans-unit.target: 计算 getEnv var 返回环境变量 var 的值。反之，可以使用 setEnv 函数。

trans-unit.source: Computation getProgName returns the name of the program as it was invoked.
trans-unit.target: Computation getProgName 返回被调用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: Computation getArgs returns a list of the program's command line arguments (not including the program name).
trans-unit.target: Computation getArgs 返回程序的命令行参数列表（不包括程序名称）。

trans-unit.source: Computation getProgName returns the name of the program as it was invoked.
trans-unit.target: Computation getProgName 返回被调用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: Computation exitWithcode throws ExitCodecode. Normally this terminates the program, returning code to the program's caller.
trans-unit.target: 计算 exitWith code 抛出 ExitCode code 。通常，这会终止程序，并向程序的调用者返回 code 。

trans-unit.source: Computation hClosehdl makes handle hdl closed. Before the computation finishes, if hdl is writable its buffer is flushed as for hFlush. Performing hClose on a handle that has already been closed has no effect; doing so is not an error. All other operations on a closed handle will fail. If hClose fails for any reason, any further operations (apart from hClose) on the handle will still fail as if hdl had been successfully closed.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hClose hdl 使句柄 hdl 关闭。在计算完成之前，如果 hdl 是可写的，则其缓冲区与 hFlush 一样被刷新。在已经关闭的句柄上执行 hClose 无效；这样做不是错误。在闭合句柄上的所有其他操作将失败。如果 hClose 由于任何原因失败，则该句柄上的任何其他操作（除 hClose 之外）仍将失败，就像 hdl 已成功关闭一样。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetBufferinghdl returns the current buffering mode for hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetBuffering hdl 返回当前缓冲模式 hdl 。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetCharhdl reads a character from the file or channel managed by hdl, blocking until a character is available.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetChar hdl 从 hdl 管理的文件或通道中读取字符，并阻塞直到有字符可用为止。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetContentshdl returns the list of characters corresponding to the unread portion of the channel or file managed by hdl, which is put into an intermediate state, semi-closed. In this state, hdl is effectively closed, but items are read from hdl on demand and accumulated in a special list returned by hGetContentshdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetContents hdl 返回与由 hdl 管理的通道或文件的未读部分相对应的字符列表，该字符处于半封闭状态，处于中间状态。在这种状态下， hdl 实际上是关闭的，但是根据需要从 hdl 中读取项目，并将其累积在 hGetContents hdl 返回的特殊列表中。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetLinehdl reads a line from the file or channel managed by hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetLine hdl 从 hdl 管理的文件或通道中读取一行。

trans-unit.source: Computation hGetPosnhdl returns the current I/O position of hdl as a value of the abstract type HandlePosn.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hGetPosn hdl 返回的当前I / O位置 hdl 为抽象类型的值 HandlePosn 。

trans-unit.source: Computation hLookAhead returns the next character from the handle without removing it from the input buffer, blocking until a character is available.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hLookAhead 从句柄中返回下一个字符，而不将其从输入缓冲区中删除，直到一个字符可用为止，它一直阻塞。

trans-unit.source: Computation hPrinthdl t writes the string representation of t given by the shows function to the file or channel managed by hdl and appends a newline.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hPrint hdl t 写入的字符串表示 t 由给定 shows 的功能所管理的文件或信道 hdl 并附加一个新行。

trans-unit.source: Computation hPutCharhdl ch writes the character ch to the file or channel managed by hdl. Characters may be buffered if buffering is enabled for hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hPutChar hdl ch 写入字符 ch 被管理的文件或通道 hdl 。如果为 hdl 启用了缓冲，则可以缓冲字符。

trans-unit.source: Computation hPutStrhdl s writes the string s to the file or channel managed by hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hPutStr hdl s 写入字符串 s 被管理的文件或通道 hdl 。

trans-unit.source: Computation hReadyhdl indicates whether at least one item is available for input from handle hdl.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hReady hdl 指示是否至少有一项可用于句柄 hdl 的输入。

trans-unit.source: Computation hSeekhdl mode i sets the position of handle hdl depending on mode. The offset i is given in terms of 8-bit bytes.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hSeek hdl mode i 根据 mode 设置手柄 hdl 的位置。偏移量 i 以8位字节的形式给出。

trans-unit.source: Computation hSetBufferinghdl mode sets the mode of buffering for handle hdl on subsequent reads and writes.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hSetBuffering hdl mode 设置在后续读写中为句柄 hdl 缓冲的模式。

trans-unit.source: Computation hTellhdl returns the current position of the handle hdl, as the number of bytes from the beginning of the file. The value returned may be subsequently passed to hSeek to reposition the handle to the current position.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hTell hdl 返回句柄 hdl 的当前位置，作为从文件开头开始的字节数。返回的值可以随后传递给 hSeek 以将手柄重新定位到当前位置。

trans-unit.source: Computation hWaitForInputhdl t waits until input is available on handle hdl. It returns True as soon as input is available on hdl, or False if no input is available within t milliseconds. Note that hWaitForInput waits until one or more full characters are available, which means that it needs to do decoding, and hence may fail with a decoding error.
trans-unit.target: 计算 hWaitForInput hdl t 等待直到输入在句柄 hdl 上可用。它返回 True ，只要输入可用的 hdl ，或 False ，如果没有输入中提供 t 毫秒。请注意， hWaitForInput 等待一个或多个完整字符可用，这意味着它需要进行解码，因此可能会因解码错误而失败。

trans-unit.source: Computation openFilefile mode allocates and returns a new, open handle to manage the file file. It manages input if mode is ReadMode, output if mode is WriteMode or AppendMode, and both input and output if mode is ReadWriteMode.
trans-unit.target: 计算 openFile file mode 分配并返回一个新的打开的句柄来管理文件 file 。它管理如果输入 mode 是 ReadMode ，如果输出 mode 是 WriteMode 或 AppendMode ，和输入和输出，如果模式是 ReadWriteMode 。

trans-unit.source: Computation getArgs returns a list of the program's command line arguments (not including the program name), as ByteStrings.
trans-unit.target: Computation getArgs 以 ByteString 的形式返回程序命令行参数的列表（不包括程序名称）。

trans-unit.source: Computation system cmd returns the exit code produced when the operating system runs the shell command cmd.
trans-unit.target: 计算 system cmd 返回操作系统运行shell命令 cmd 时产生的退出代码。

trans-unit.source: Concurrency is "lightweight", which means that both thread creation and context switching overheads are extremely low. Scheduling of Haskell threads is done internally in the Haskell runtime system, and doesn't make use of any operating system-supplied thread packages.
trans-unit.target: 并发是 "轻量级 "的,这意味着线程创建和上下文切换的开销都极低。Haskell线程的调度是在Haskell运行时系统内部完成的,并没有使用任何操作系统提供的线程包。

trans-unit.source: Consider the following concurrent data structure, a skip channel. This is a channel for an intermittent source of high bandwidth information (for example, mouse movement events.) Writing to the channel never blocks, and reading from the channel only returns the most recent value, or blocks if there are no new values. Multiple readers are supported with a dupSkipChan operation.
trans-unit.target: 考虑以下并发数据结构，即跳过通道。这是间歇性的高带宽信息源（例如，鼠标移动事件）的通道。写入该通道不会阻塞，从该通道读取只会返回最近的值，如果没有新值，则阻塞。 dupSkipChan 操作支持多个阅读器。
